Topics

Your first stop for any help related to computing with data should be this book:

Getting used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown

You can also seek help from its author, Chester Ismay in ITS. Other resources:

RMarkdown

  • Reproducible Research through R Markdown
  • Intro to Markdown (video)
  • R Markdown with RStudio (video)
  • R Markdown Cheatsheet
  • Reproducibility Guide

R

  • Datacamp: Intro to R Course

  • Cookbook for R
